TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedListViewItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示清單檢視控制項中之核取項目的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A會儲存在已選取的項目控制項。A stores the checked items in a control. 如果項目只能夠檢查屬性控制設為 `true`。Items can only be checked if the property of the control is set to `true`. 項目儲存在中所包含的項目。The items stored in the are items contained in the . 類別會儲存所有項目顯示在控制項。The class stores all items displayed in the control. 下表顯示如何的範例儲存的項目以及選取項目中的狀態範例控制項。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states in an example control. |索引Index|項目Item|檢查清單檢視中的狀態Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|若未選取Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已核取Checked| |22|Item3Item3|若未選取Unchecked| |33|Item4Item4|已核取Checked| |44|Item5Item5|已核取Checked| 根據上表中的範例下, 表會示範如何會出現。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|簽入 ListViewItemCollection 的項目Checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|--------------------------------------------| |00|Item2Item2| |11|Item4Item4| |22|Item5Item5| 您可以使用的屬性與這個類別的方法來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否移除的項目類別所屬的。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷中項目的位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性對應中的項目索引鍵。The property of a corresponds to the key for an item in a . 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串，傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, returns -1. 如果稱為連續，最後一個傳回索引會檢查索引鍵的符合項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.

exception.span: 擁有人 位於虛擬模式中。

span.span: The owner is in virtual mode.
